metadata.title: USN-6756-1 -- less vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that less mishandled newline characters in file names. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening specially crafted files, an attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary commands on the host.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6756-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  less - 590-1ubuntu0.22.04.3 No subscription required
